In Spring 2025, the Perception, Action, and Development Lab celebrated doctoral student Zachary Kelly's successful second-year project defense in the Cognition and Cognitive Neuroscience area. On May 21, 2025, Zachary presented his project, "The Effects of Cognitive Load on Full-Body Gaze Control During 3D Visual Search", in the Cognitive Proseminar.
